channel.title: Please a good coder, give me this code, and explain, tysm people!
channel.description: Hello, I was wondering if someone can get me the code for adding a bank at the coord's that i give you- 2855,3677, please can i have the code, and pless tell me where in the client.java file to add it., ty everyone!

item.title: Please a good coder, give me this code, and explain, tysm people!
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

lol ok delete that post now… ok

heres what you do ok

[code] public void placeObject(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face, int ObjectType) {
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8));

  outStream.createFrame(101);
  outStream.writeByteC((ObjectType<<2) + (Face&3));
  outStream.writeByte(0);

  if (NewObjectID != -1) {
     outStream.createFrame(151);
     outStream.writeByteS(0);
     outStream.writeWordBigEndian(NewObjectID);
     outStream.writeByteS((ObjectType<<2) + (Face&3));
  }

}
public void placeGlobalObject(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face, int ObjectType) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)) {
if(person.distanceToPoint(objectX, objectY) <= 60) {
person.placeObject(objectX, objectY, NewObjectID, Face, ObjectType);
}
}
}
}
}
[/code]

after the last }
put

AddGlobalObject(2855, 3677, 2213, -3, 10);  // bank

there you go… if you get errors pm me on aim
btw whats ur name for aim i need 2 add you…[br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2007, 04:00:01 AM[/size][hr]dude add me on aim
master code2007

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

[quote=“kickflip395, post:5, topic:126353”]k let me see if it workz m8[br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2007, 03:42:06 AM[/size][hr]}
public void AddGlobalObj(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face, int ObjectType) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
if(p != null)
{
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”))
{
if(person.distanceToPoint(objectX, objectY) <= 60)
{
person.ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, NewObjectID, Face, ObjectType);
}
}
, what row’s im confused[/quote]
right dude… go down 2 the last bit… of that ok…
or have u got msn
if you have add me on it
rhys274@hotmail.co.uk
